name: Mesh Inclusion
description: Test a point for Mesh inclusion

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Mesh for inclusion test (only closed meshes will be considered)

inputs.name: Strict
inputs.description: If true, then the inclusion is strict

name: Mesh Depth
description: Validate the depth of a mesh.

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Mesh for inclusion test (only closed meshes will be considered)

outputs.name: Valid
outputs.description: True if mesh does not exceed limits

name: Face Boundaries
description: Convert all mesh faces to polylines

outputs.name: Boundaries
outputs.description: Boundary polylines for each mesh face

name: Mesh Sphere
description: Create a mesh sphere.

inputs.name: V Count
inputs.description: Number of faces from pole to pole

name: Face Boundaries
description: Convert all mesh faces to polylines

outputs.name: Boundaries
outputs.description: Boundary polylines for each mesh face

name: Occlusion
description: Solve occlusion for a collection of view rays and obstructions.

outputs.name: Hits
outputs.description: Number of occluded rays per sample.

outputs.name: Occlusion
outputs.description: Occlusion topology for every individual sample.

name: Facet Dome
description: Create a facetted dome

inputs.name: Points
inputs.description: Points on dome that describe the facet centers

inputs.name: Box
inputs.description: Optional bounding box for facet boundary

name: Quad Remesh
description: Perform quad-remeshing on a shape.

outputs.name: Quad result
outputs.description: Resulting mesh with quad faces only.

name: Settings (Quality)
description: Represents 'Smooth & slower' mesh settings.

name: Mesh Quad
description: Create a mesh quad.

name: Delaunay Mesh
description: Delaunay triangulation

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If no plane is provided, then the best-fit plane will be used.

name: Delete Vertices
description: Delete vertices from a mesh

inputs.name: Indices
inputs.description: List of all vertex indices to delete

inputs.name: Shrink
inputs.description: Shrink quads, if true, quads will become triangles if possible

outputs.name: Mesh
outputs.description: Mesh with all indexed vertices removed

name: Settings (Speed)
description: Represents 'Jagged & faster' mesh settings.

name: Mesh Box
description: Create a mesh box.

name: Mesh Edges
description: Get all the edges of a mesh

outputs.name: Naked Edges
outputs.description: Edges with valence 1 (a single adjacent face)

name: Mesh Split Plane
description: Split a mesh with an infinite plane.

name: Triangulate
description: Triangulate all quads in a mesh

outputs.name: Count
outputs.description: Number of quads that were triangulated

name: Substrate
description: Substrate algorithm inspired by Jared Tarbell (Complexification.net)

inputs.name: Deviation
inputs.description: Angular deviation (in radians) of new lines

name: Proximity 2D
description: Search for two-dimensional proximity within a point list

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If null, the best fit plane is used

inputs.name: Group
inputs.description: Maximum number of closest points to find

name: Unweld Mesh
description: Unweld (split) creases in a mesh

name: Flip Mesh
description: Flip the normal vectors of a mesh

name: Blur Mesh
description: Blur the colours on a mesh

name: Settings (Custom)
description: Represents custom mesh settings.

inputs.name: Stitch Seams
inputs.description: Edges of adjacent faces are matched up if True.

inputs.name: Simple Planes
inputs.description: Planar faces are meshed with a minimum amount of triangles.

inputs.name: Refine
inputs.description: Refine the initial grid if it exceeds tolerance accuracy.

inputs.name: Min Count
inputs.description: Minimum number of quads in the initial grid per face.

inputs.name: Max Count
inputs.description: Maximum number of quads in the initial grid per face.

inputs.name: Aspect Ratio
inputs.description: Maximum aspect ratio of quads in the initial grid.

inputs.name: Max Distance
inputs.description: Maximum allowed distance between center of edges and underlying surface.

inputs.name: Max Angle
inputs.description: Maximum allowed angle (in degrees) between the normals of two adjacent quads.

name: Mesh Join
description: Join a set of meshes into a single mesh

name: Disjoint Mesh
description: Split a mesh into disjoint pieces.

name: Cull Faces
description: Cull faces from a mesh

outputs.name: Mesh
outputs.description: Mesh with all indicated faces removed

name: Mesh Surface
description: Create a Surface UV mesh

inputs.name: U Count
inputs.description: Number of quads in U direction

inputs.name: V Count
inputs.description: Number of quads in V direction

name: Mesh Triangle
description: Create a mesh triangle.

name: Mesh Brep
description: Create a mesh that approximates Brep geometry

inputs.name: Settings
inputs.description: Settings to be used by meshing algorithm

name: Mesh Sphere Ex
description: Create a mesh sphere from square patches.

inputs.name: Count
inputs.description: Number of faces along each patch edge

name: Voronoi Cell
description: Compute a single 3D Voronoi cell

name: QuadTree
description: A two-dimensional quadtree structure

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If omitted, the best fit plane is used

name: TriRemesh
description: Convert a Brep or Mesh into a mesh of near equilateral triangles

inputs.name: Geometry
inputs.description: Initial Mesh, Brep, Surface or Curve to remesh

inputs.name: Target
inputs.description: Optional different target mesh to pull to. If none given, initial mesh is used.

inputs.name: Features
inputs.description: Optional additional curves or points to preserve

inputs.name: Iterations
inputs.description: Number of remeshing steps to perform

name: Mesh Plane
description: Create a mesh plane.

name: Quadrangulate
description: Quadrangulate as many triangles as possible in a mesh

inputs.name: Angle
inputs.description: Angle threshold. Triangles that exceed this kink-angle will not be merged.

inputs.name: Ratio
inputs.description: Ratio threshold. Quads that have a ratio (shortest diagonal/longest diagonal) that exceed the threshold, will not be considered.

outputs.name: Mesh
outputs.description: Quadrangulated mesh (not all triangles are guaranteed to be converted).

outputs.name: Count
outputs.description: Number of triangles that were quadrangulated

name: Convex Hull
description: Compute the planar, convex hull for a collection of points

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If no plane is provided, then the best-fit plane will be used.

outputs.name: Hull
outputs.description: Convex hull in base plane space

outputs.name: Indices
outputs.description: Indices of points on convex hull

name: Voronoi Groups
description: Compute a custom set of nested voronoi diagrams.

name: Cull Vertices
description: Cull vertices from a mesh

inputs.name: Shrink
inputs.description: Shrink quads, if true, quads will become triangles if possible

outputs.name: Mesh
outputs.description: Mesh with all indicated vertices removed

name: Weld Mesh
description: Weld (merge) creases in a mesh

name: Voronoi
description: Planar voronoi diagram for a collection of points

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If no plane is provided, then the best-fit plane will be used.

name: Mesh Closest Point
description: Finds the closest point on a mesh

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Mesh to search for closest point

outputs.name: Point
outputs.description: Location on mesh closest to search point

name: OcTree
description: A three-dimensional oc-tree structure

name: Exposure
description: Solve mesh exposure for a collection of energy rays and obstructions.

inputs.name: Energy
inputs.description: Optional Energy values for each ray

inputs.name: Lambert
inputs.description: If true, Lambertian shading will be applied,

outputs.name: Exposure
outputs.description: Combined exposure for every individual mesh vertex.

outputs.name: Range
outputs.description: Exposure Range for the entire mesh.

name: Deconstruct Face
description: Deconstruct a mesh face into its four corner indices.

outputs.name: Corner D
outputs.description: Index of fourth face vertex (identical to C if face is a triangle)

name: Voronoi Groups
description: Compute a custom set of nested voronoi diagrams.

name: Mesh Eval
description: Evaluate a mesh at a given parameter

name: Deconstruct Mesh
description: Deconstruct a mesh into its component parts.

name: Voronoi 3D
description: Volumetric voronoi diagram for a collection of points

outputs.name: Boundary
outputs.description: List of boolean values indicating for each cell whether it is part of the original boundary

name: Mesh Shadow
description: Compute the shadow outline for a mesh object

name: Simple Mesh
description: Create a mesh that represents a Brep as simply as possible

inputs.name: Brep
inputs.description: Brep to mesh, only breps with triangle or quad faces are supported.

name: MetaBall(t) Custom
description: 2D Metaball isosurface by threshold and custom charge values

inputs.name: Accuracy
inputs.description: Isocurve sampling accuracy (leave blank for default accuracy)

name: MetaBall(t)
description: 2D Metaball isosurface by threshold

inputs.name: Accuracy
inputs.description: Isocurve sampling accuracy (leave blank for default accuracy)

name: Unify Mesh
description: Unify the normals of a mesh

outputs.name: Count
outputs.description: Number of faces that were flipped

name: Face Normals
description: Extract the normals and center points of all faces in a mesh

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Mesh for normal and center point extraction

name: Delete Faces
description: Delete faces from a mesh

inputs.name: Indices
inputs.description: List of all face indices to delete

outputs.name: Mesh
outputs.description: Mesh with all indexed faces removed

name: Mesh Colours
description: Assign a repeating colour pattern to a mesh object.

name: Face Circles
description: Solve the circumscribed circles for all mesh faces

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Mesh for normal and center point extraction

outputs.name: Centers
outputs.description: Circum-circles for all mesh triangles (quads are skipped)

outputs.name: Ratio
outputs.description: Ratio of triangles; altitude / longest edge. (quads are skipped)

name: Delaunay Edges
description: Delaunay connectivity

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If no plane is provided, then the best-fit plane will be used.

name: Align Vertices
description: Align nearby vertices in a mesh

name: MetaBall
description: 2D Metaball isocurve through point

inputs.name: Accuracy
inputs.description: Isocurve sampling accuracy (leave blank for adaptive accuracy)

name: Mesh Plane
description: Create a mesh plane.

name: Construct Mesh
description: Construct a mesh from vertices, faces and optional colours.

name: Smooth Mesh
description: Smooth the vertices of a mesh

name: Proximity 3D
description: Search for three-dimensional proximity within a point list

inputs.name: Group
inputs.description: Maximum number of closest points to find

name: Mesh Spray
description: Assign colours to a mesh based on spray points.

name: Voronoi
description: Planar voronoi diagram for a collection of points

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional base plane. If no plane is provided, then the best-fit plane will be used.

name: Quad Remesh Settings
description: Create setting for Quad-remeshing.

inputs.name: Target Count
inputs.description: Number of quads to aim for in the result.

inputs.name: Adaptive Size
inputs.description: A number in the range [0, 100] controlling how the quad sizes change depending on curvature.

inputs.name: Adaptive Count
inputs.description: True if the number of quads is allowed to be higher for high-curvature areas.

inputs.name: Hard Edges
inputs.description: Detect and retain hard edges in the input mesh.

inputs.name: Seam Edges
inputs.description: Detect and retain brep-face boundary edges (0=Off, 1=Smart, 2=Strict).
